headline: Afterpay Data Reveals 96% of U.S. Customers Paid Off Black Friday Cyber Monday Purchases Early or On Time, Demonstrating Responsible Spending During Peak Shopping Season
summary: DISTRIBUTED-WORK-MODEL/SAN FRANCISCO, January 15, 2026--Afterpay, a leading global fintech company and pioneer of the Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) movement, today announced that 96% of its U.S. Pay-in-4 customers who shopped during the 2025 Black Friday and Cyber Monday period paid off their purchases early or on time.
